participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong opinion on colors.
participant_1.background: i don't drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i'm a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and thoughtful, finds joy in helping others and has a taste for hearty meals.
participant_2.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries.
